Text: how the hell does this work?
I was playing for like 1hour and a half! and saved alto of times, when i was going to play today, it had started all over again ;o ????

Okay, for those of you that want to play FireRed and not lose your game saves, all you have to do is go into the emulator options and change the NDS Cartridge Media to "FLASH 512KBytes"

You will have to do this EVERY time you start the emulator up, but you can save and resave as many times as you want, once you do.
